sentences.sContent: Imagine trying to balance a chest of drawers on just one of its legs, on top of a boulder, and you get an idea of what Gray gets up to.
sentences.sContent_eng: Imagine trying to balance a chest of drawers on just one of its legs, on top of a boulder, and you get an idea of what Gray gets up to.
sentences.sCn: 想像自己尝试仅仅依靠衣柜的一个腿把它平稳地放到一个大圆石上，你就知道格雷达到了什么境界。
